entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
